fr.projet.jee.utils.interfaces

Interface IPopulate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Populate

    public interface IPopulate
    Author:
    Alexandre Leonardi Methods to fill the database with randomly generated persons and groups cf utils.properties for the list of person names and group names

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createAll()
      Creates the maximum number of groups (see createGroups()) and the maximum number of persons (see createPersons(int)) and sorts them through all the groups
      void createGroups()
      Creates as much groups as possible given the group names given in the property file
      void createGroups(int nbGroups)
      Creates a given number of groupes which must be less or equal to the number of group names in the property file
      void createPersons(int nbGroups)
      Creates as much persons as possible without creating 2 with the same name (according to the number of surnames and last names avaiable in the property file) and sorts them among a given number of groups
      void createPersons(int nbGroups, int nbPersons)
      Creates a a given number of persons, which must be less or equal to the maximum authorized (see createPersons(int)) and sorts them through groups

    • Method Detail

      • createGroups

        void createGroups()
           throws InvalidGroupException
        Creates as much groups as possible given the group names given in the property file
        Throws:
        InvalidGroupException

      • createGroups

        void createGroups(int nbGroups)
           throws InvalidGroupException
        Creates a given number of groupes which must be less or equal to the number of group names in the property file
        Parameters:
        nbGroups - the number of groups to be created
        Throws:
        InvalidGroupException

      • createPersons

        void createPersons(int nbGroups)
            throws InvalidPersonException
        Creates as much persons as possible without creating 2 with the same name (according to the number of surnames and last names avaiable in the property file) and sorts them among a given number of groups
        Parameters:
        nbGroups - the number of groups among which we sort the persons
        Throws:
        InvalidPersonException

      • createPersons

        void createPersons(int nbGroups,
                   int nbPersons)
            throws InvalidPersonException
        Creates a a given number of persons, which must be less or equal to the maximum authorized (see createPersons(int)) and sorts them through groups
        Parameters:
        nbGroups - the number of groups among which we want to sort the persons
        nbPersons - the number of persons we want to create
        Throws:
        InvalidPersonException

      • createAll

        void createAll()
        Creates the maximum number of groups (see createGroups()) and the maximum number of persons (see createPersons(int)) and sorts them through all the groups
